name: MONGR
description:
Harvesting organs has never been so cute!

You are an alien who is traveling far from home, and you're starting to run low on fuel. Fortunately for you, the popular meta-web marketplace known as MONGR is always offering large quantities of fuel in exchange for illicit goods. These goods are galactic contraband and are crafted from the organs of human abductees. How many days can you last?

The game uses mouse pointer control and you can press F1 to go fullscreen.

Design + code: Xandersauce
Design + art: minor_gods
Additional art: Kate!
